titles.title: Worthy of glory and worthy of honor

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy of glory, and worthy of honor,
And worthy of praise is He.
Worthy of glory, and worthy of honor,
And worthy of praise is He.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He has redeemed me by the blood of Lamb,
Set my spirit free.
Worthy of glory, and worthy of honor,
And worthy of praise is He.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
You are the words and the music,
You are the song that I sing.
You are the melody, You are the harmony.
Praise to Your name will I bring.
You are Almighty God.
You are the Lord of Lords.
You are the King of kings.
Now I return to You,
The song that You gave to me.
You are the song that I sing.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Digno de gloria, digno de honra,
Digno de alabanza es el. (2x)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
El me ha redimido por la sangre de Jesus.
Hizo mi espiritu libre
Digno de gloria, digno de honra,
Digno de alabanza es el.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Tu eres la palabra y la musica,
Eres el coro que canto.
Tu eres melodia, eres armonia,
Alabemos el nombre del Se単or.
Tu eres poderoso Se単or de se単ores,
Tu eres el Rey de Reyes,
Estoy regresando el coro que me diste,
Alabemos el nombre del Se単or.
